==Reception and awards==
==Reception and awards==
â
Cogs was, in 2010, the ''Grand Prize Winner'' at the [[Indie Game Challenge]], in the professional category, having also recieved the ''Achievment in Art Direction'' and ''Achievment in Gameplay'' on the same contest.<ref>http://indiegamechallenge.com/2010-winners/</ref> The game was also a finalist at the 2010 [[Independent Games Festival]]<ref>http://www.igf.com/2010/01/independent_games_festival_201.html</ref> and 2009 [[INDICADE]]<ref>http://www.cogsgame.com/</ref>
+
Cogs was, in 2010, the ''Grand Prize Winner'' at the [[Indie Game Challenge]], in the professional category, having also recieved the ''Achievment in Art Direction'' and ''Achievment in Gameplay'' on the same contest.<ref>http://indiegamechallenge.com/2010-winners/</ref> The game was also a finalist at the 2010 [[Independent Games Festival]]<ref>http://www.igf.com/2010/01/independent_games_festival_201.html</ref> and 2009 [[IndieCade]]<ref>http://www.cogsgame.com/</ref>
